name: Herma
greetingDialogue: Hey, I wanted to drop by!
negativeReaction: There's always beauty to be seen.

dialogues.text: I wasn't sure I was happy with the haircut you gave me last time, but people really liked it. You nailed the look!
I was scared I wasn't special enough, but I shouldn't be affraid about that. People like me anyway.
You sure are. I was scared I wasn't special enough, but I shouldn't be affraid about that. People like me anyway.
Thanks! When we form a unitied society, when can make life better for everyone. I think that's special.
I agree! When we as a people form a unitied society, when can make life better for everyone. I think that's beautiful.
Thanks! When we as a people form a unitied society, when can make life better for everyone. I think that's special.
I agree! When we as a people form a unitied society, when can make life better for everyone. I think that's beautiful.
